feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 3:18 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
